name: Absorb (Meowdy, Toba)
description:
You are Jimmy, and your life goal is to protect the treasure of Alexander the First (Your grandfather). However, the filthy adventurers from the town heard about these riches, and are coming to take your gold!!

Actual Description:
Eat adventurers to level up and get new abilities, but not too many, or else you explode. 

Controls:

WASD

space - absorb

e - upgrade

LMB - fire your stun pew pew

Credits:

Artist - Celine Tang

Music - Celine Tang

Programming - Tom Barezer Ayalon

Special Thanks 

Moral Support: mAtThEw gUo
